trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting>-hendelse når en Slett-knapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen sletter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelsesbehandling som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel en post før du sletter den, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for oppføringen slettes og å angi at sletteoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå indeksen for en oppføring i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå nøkkelfelt og ikke er en nøkkel felt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: These values are useful if you want to verify the record before deleting it.
trans-unit.target: Disse verdiene er nyttig hvis du vil kontrollere oppføringen før du sletter den.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to modify the key field values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er mulig å endre nøkkelfeltverdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change these values, the record that corresponds to the new key field values will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer disse verdiene, slettes posten som svarer til de nye verdiene for nøkkelfeltet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>|The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `rowIndex` parameteren. | > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs that contains the names and values of the key fields of the deleted items.
trans-unit.target: Henter en bestilte ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par som inneholder navn og verdier av nøkkelfeltene for slettede elementer.

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key field or fields for the record to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen nøkler for å få tilgang til verdiene for nøkkelfeltet eller felt for post som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, to change the record to delete, or to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene du kontrollerer oppføringen før du sletter det. Hvis du vil endre oppføringen slette eller loggføre slettede poster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inneholder bare nøkkelfeltene for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To access the name/value pair values for the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til navn/verdi-par verdier for feltene ikke er en nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nøkler returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the key fields.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekter som representerer nøkkelfeltene.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the key field values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til nøkkelen feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns key field values directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordelen ved bruk av indeksering er at den returnerer feltverdier direkte.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can modify the key field values of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid endre nøkkelfeltet verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: If you change the key field values, the corresponding record is be deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer nøkkelen feltverdiene, er den tilsvarende posten slettes fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs used to match the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder en bestilte ordliste for nøkkelfeltet navn/verdi-par brukes til å samsvare med elementet skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen i raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen i raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: The row index is often used to retrieve the specified row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, which allows you to access the row's properties.
trans-unit.target: Radindeksen ofte brukes til å hente den angitte raden fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen, som gir deg tilgang til den raden egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i raden som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for elementet skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the non-key fields for the record to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen verdier til å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel for oppføringen som skal slettes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to verify the record before deleting it, or to keep a log of deleted records.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene du kontrollerer oppføringen før du sletter den, eller å loggføre slettede poster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not contain the key field or fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen inneholder ikke felt eller felt.

trans-unit.source: To access the name/value pair values for the key field or fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til navn/verdi-par verdiene for felt eller felt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verdier returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the non-key fields.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekter som representerer feltene ikke er en nøkkel.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke indeksering av den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>objekt for å få tilgang til feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly.
trans-unit.target: Fordelen ved bruk av indeksering er at den returnerer feltverdier direkte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> som inneholder en liste over ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par for elementet skal slettes.
